title: Amazon S3 to AWS Lambda  with .NET
description: Automate the creation of thumbnail images from new images on Amazon S3 leveraging Lambda and .NET

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an Amazon S3 bucket for image hosting with an AWS Lambda function that gets invoked when new images are added to the bucket. The Lambda function uses .NET 6 to create a thumbnail of the image and save the thumbnail back to the same S3 bucket.

bullets.text: Using an Amazon S3 trigger to invoke a Lambda function
